alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Grady (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 4:16PM CDT until August 12 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Grady County in central Oklahoma... Southeastern Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 415 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Anadarko, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Anadarko, Verden, Gracemont, Lake Chickasha, and Stecker. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
